title: "Attempt to join queue failed."
body:
This is happening every single time I want to join any mode I try. I just reinstalled League after a couple of years away... I'm also using the new launcher. What do i do?

Only MSG it gives me is to come to the support and ask for help...

replies.body: When you enter queue, your network has to smoothly transition over to the rest of your group.  It sounds like a connection problem is failing to establish that communication and leaving you behind, so I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This is likely network related so a reinstall wouldn't really help.  Let me know if you have any questions!
